mapper.select: SELECT LR_NO, L_NO, M_NO, LR_COMMENT, LR_SCORE1, LR_SCORE2, LR_SCORE3, LR_SCORE4, LR_SCORE5, LR_TOTALSCORE, LR_REGDATE FROM MEMBER M, LECTURE_REVIEW R WHERE M.M_NO=R.M_NO AND R.L_NO=#{L_NO} ORDER BY R.R_ORDER ASC

INSERT INTO LECTURE_REVIEW ( LR_NO, L_NO, M_NO, LR_COMMENT, LR_SCORE1, LR_SCORE2, LR_SCORE3, LR_SCORE4, LR_SCORE5, LR_TOTALSCORE, LR_REGDATE ) VALUES ( #{L_NO}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(LR_NO),0)+1 from LECTURE_REVIEW), #{M_NO},
#{LR_COMMENT},
#{LR_SCORE1}, #{LR_SCORE2}, #{LR_SCORE3}, #{LR_SCORE4}, #{LR_SCORE5}, #{LR_TOTALSCORE}, sysdate )
